Tandy & Foster bụ ụlọ ọrụ Amerịka na-ahụ maka ihe owuwu na-arụ ọrụ site na 1908 ruo 1914 na New York na New Jersey, nke dị na New York City.
Vertner Woodson Tandy (1885 ruo 1910), George Washington Foster (1866 ruo 1923) guzobere ya na 1908

Tandy bụ onye Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ na-ewu ụlọ nke steeti New York nyere ikike na Foster so na ndị Africa-America na-ewu ihe owuwu nke steeti nke New Jersey nyere ikike na 1908, na mgbe e mesịrị New York (1916)
Tandy na Foster gbasara mmekọrịta ha na 1914 ma mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ha abụọ na-arụ ọrụ na nzuzo, Foster nwetara ikike ya na New York site na 1915.
